room_title: Escape room "The Lair of the Puzzlemaster" by Trapped! Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: It was a decent room... didn't really feel like there was a strong atmosphere or story, but I pretty much enjoyed it.  Puzzles are ok.  Staff was friendly.

room_title: Escape room "The Lair of the Puzzlemaster" by Trapped! Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: We played the lair of the puzzlemaster and loved it. The room was challenging and very well designed with some really cool effects. We go to escape rooms pretty often and were very impressed with this one. We'll be going back to try the other rooms in the future!!

room_title: Escape room "The Lair of the Puzzlemaster" by Trapped! Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: Lots of fun! The Puzzlemaster room was my first escape room experience, and I had a great time. The puzzles were challenging without being impossible, and even though we had to call in a few hints, there weren't any penalties for getting hints. It requires a lot of creative thinking and problem-solving skills, and the room design is great. The staff is super friendly and helpful. Overall a fantastic experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Lair of the Puzzlemaster" by Trapped! Escape Room in Las Vegas
review: The Puzzlemaster was easily the best escape room I've done in Vegas thus far. Make sure you come ready to think and act, because this room isn't for the simple minded. We will definitely be coming back for the other rooms. The staff was amazing, and incredibly helpful. Wish I could give them more than 5 stars
